new_item.title: New Item
new_item.details: Our [Flavor] Frappuccino is a rich, icy blend of premium coffee and your favorite flavor, topped with whipped cream for an extra touch of sweetness.

workWithUs.heading: Work with us!
workWithUs.description: Interested in joining our team? We are always looking for passionate and talented individuals in the coffee and hospitality industry.
workWithUs.formDescription: If you'd like to work with us, please fill out the form below, and we will review your application and get back to you soon.

whoWeAreText: Our story began in 1930 with an enchanting trip to Damascus, which inspired Abdel Rahim Koueider's father to make the most delicious sweets he knew, passed down from generation to generation. Using simple ingredients like semolina, sugar, milk, and butter, we have delighted lovers of delicious sweets rich in the original taste of oriental sweets and ice cream.
aSweetStoryTitle: A Sweet Story of Indulgence and Inspiration
aSweetStoryText: Our story began in 1930 with an enchanting trip to Damascus, which inspired Abdel Rahim Koueider's father to make the most delicious sweets he knew, passed down from generation to generation. Using simple ingredients like semolina, sugar, milk, and butter, we have delighted lovers of delicious sweets rich in the original taste of oriental sweets and ice cream.
coffePointDescription: Our story began in 1930 with an enchanting trip to Damascus, which inspired Abdel Rahim Koueider's father to make the most delicious and exquisite sweets he knew, passed down from generation to generation. Using simple ingredients such as semolina, sugar, milk, and butter, we were able to delight lovers of delicious sweets rich with the original taste of oriental sweets and ice cream.
theOriginalTasteOfCoffeeDescription: Our story began in 1930 with an enchanting trip to Damascus, which inspired Abdel Rahim Koueider's father to make the most delicious and exquisite sweets he knew, passed down from generation to generation. Using simple ingredients such as semolina, sugar, milk, and butter, we were able to delight lovers of delicious sweets rich with the original taste of oriental sweets and ice cream.
commitment_to_privacy: At Coffee Point, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose the information we gather from you when you visit our website or use our services.
personal_information: Personal Information you voluntarily provide, such as:
automatic_information: Automatic Information about your device and website usage, including:
use_purposes: To process and fulfill your orders.
To communicate with you about your orders, account, or inquiries.
To provide customer support and assistance.
To improve our products, services, and website.
To send promotional offers, newsletters, or marketing materials (you can opt-out anytime).
To detect, prevent, and address technical issues or fraud.
information_protection: We take reasonable measures to safeguard the confidentiality, integrity, and security of your personal information. However, please note that no method of online transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
disclosure_scenarios: Service Providers and Business Partners: To assist in delivering our products and services.
Government Authorities: To comply with legal obligations or legitimate requests.
Mergers or Acquisitions: As part of transferring assets during business restructuring.
rights_details: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time by contacting us through the contact details below.
opt_out: You can opt out of receiving promotional communications by following the instructions provided in the communication or contacting us directly.
delete_account_instructions: You can delete your account by navigating to: Your Account -> Settings -> Delete Account.
update_details: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Any significant updates will be communicated by posting the revised policy on our website.
contact_details: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us via:
facebook_app_management: You can also manage and remove the "Coffee Point" application associated with your Facebook account by navigating to: Settings & Privacy -> Settings -> Apps and Websites.
email_error_occurred: An error occurred while sending the email.
subject: Subject
Signup failed. Please check your details: Signup failed. Please check your details and try again.
privacy_details: At Coffee Point, we are committed to protecting your privacy. All personal information provided to our website will remain confidential and will not be shared with any third parties except governmental authorities if required by law. Users have the right to access, update, or delete their personal information at any time. You can opt out of receiving promotional emails by following the instructions in the email or contacting us directly. Account Deletion: Users can delete their accounts by navigating to: Your Account -> Settings -> Delete Account.
intellectual_property_details: All content on the Coffee Point website, including text, graphics, logos, images, icons, audio clips, data compilations, and software, is owned by Coffee Point. Any unauthorized copying, duplication, resale, or modification is strictly prohibited without prior written consent. Trademarks and logos displayed on the website are the property of Coffee Point or its partners and are protected under local and international trademark laws.
content_ownership_details: All images, graphics, videos, music, audio files, and text on the website are considered part of Coffee Point’s content and are fully protected under intellectual property laws.
third_party_links_cookies_details: Coffee Point uses cookies to enhance the user experience: Cookies store login details and preferences for faster access. Cookies help personalize services and remember user preferences. Users can modify cookie preferences via their browser settings.
website_usage_details: By accessing the Coffee Point website, users agree to abide by its terms and conditions. Users are encouraged to create accounts for an improved shopping experience, though purchasing as a guest is also an option. Accurate and complete personal information is required for order processing.
ordering_availability_details: By placing an order on Coffee Point, users are agreeing to purchase the product at the listed price, which includes VAT. Orders are subject to availability. If a product is unavailable, users are entitled to a refund, minus applicable administrative fees. Coffee Point reserves the right to decline or cancel orders at its discretion.
payment_terms_details: Multiple payment options are available, including: Cash on delivery. Credit and debit cards. Loyalty points from Coffee Point’s marketing programs.
return_exchange_policy_details: Returns and exchanges are governed by the company’s internal policies and conditions for product preservation and storage. Policies are subject to periodic updates.
modification_of_terms_details: Coffee Point reserves the right to amend its terms and conditions without prior notice. Continued use of the website indicates acceptance of the new terms.
disputes_details: Any disputes arising from the use of Coffee Point’s website will be governed by Egyptian law, with Arabic as the official language of arbitration.
